name: Villa Arcachon
description:
DESCRIPTION
This five-star establishment is a true haven of peace and promotes serenity during private events! During your wedding at Villa Arcachon you will find warm, modern and luxurious facilities all enhanced by a unique style. Only situated at 30 min of Bordeaux Airport, Villa Arachon is a 5000m2 property on the beach side…enjoy the amazing sea/bay view from the villa, the garden, the pool deck and float in the invigorating natural spring water of her stunning ecological pool …
Villa Arachon has 8 on-suite bed rooms of which 4 with sea view. She is the perfect venue for intimate weddings!
Our capacity policy allows us to accept up to 100 guests outdoor. In some circumstances we are willing to be flexible up to 120 guests (under a marquee).
We may accept some suppliers you desire to work with. Yet, we do have a list of suppliers with whom we work. It will be our pleasure to forward you this list if needed.
At a short walk from Villa Arcachon there is a nice hotel and other accomodations that can accommodate the other guests (very reasonable room prices).
About the Villa:
Villa Arcachon is an idyllic venue suited to guests who would like to enjoy the best of the best in a luxury yet authentic accommodation with outstanding service, and create unique memorable magic moments and unusual wedding experiences. It is a luxury property Made-In-Love by the current owners. Villa Arcachon, considered to be one of the best examples of Arcachon Architecture with an Italian influence, was built in 1903. This sensitive renovation has been executed with love, great care and eye for detail.
The surrounding region Aquitaine, is France’s gastronomic heartland, and much of the country’s finest ingredients are sourced here. Wedding guests can enjoy a journey of gastronomic discovery that sets the taste buds tingling and leaves the palate sated. Regional specialties include – locally farmed oysters, foie gras, caviar and of course the finest, of fine wine the world has to offer. Bassin d’Arcachon is a chic and trendy place visited by many French celebrities/VIPS, however at the same time it has kept its authenticity and tranquility…the choice is yours!
Free onsite activities
Boules, Croquet, Table Tennis, Football Table, Trampoline, Volley Ball, Canoes, Cycles
External Activities
The Bay is also a natural playground offering an extraordinary choice of activities - we and Villa Arcachon can help with bookings, trips, equipment for:
Watersports: fishing, sailing, boating, wakeboarding, kite-surfing, and of course regular surfing
Golf: there are 20 courses within an hour's drive, including the highly rated Golf du Médoc, and PGA Championship course at Gujan-Mestras
Tennis: there are several local clubs within a 15 minute drive
Biking, hiking, horseback-riding
The above is not exhaustive but a small sample of what can be enjoyed.
Private, exclusive use venue rental includes
French breakfast
Welcome drink with local specialities ( the day of your arrival)
Daily cleaning (of the rooms)
Coordinator the day of your wedding
Intendante the day of your wedding
Security guard
Free wifi
Activities on site
For more information please do get in touch.
